issue.title: [C++] Implement serial version of join
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4630](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4630). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement the serial version of join operator.
